long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Tel-A-Friend Chrome Extension provides database driven screen pops. The extension integrates with back-office databases (CRM). Users can search any internal database and present the findings in a new window. The extension also recognizes any phone number in Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial.
